name: HATCHICK
description: The game begins in the middle of the room where a chick is in a deep sleep, when a butterfly flies into the room from no where. Flaps of the butterfly awakens the chick. The chick begins to fly with the help of the butterfly. But before long, enemies are appearing with an attempt to make the chick fall into a sleep again.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel(R) i5-3570 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel(R) i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
